value.title: Open the pod bay doors, please, HAL: Meta's AI simulates lip-reading
value.excerpt: The software uses the popular approach of "attention" to make videos of speakers' lips and audio waveforms reinforce one another in ways much more efficient and accurate than prior approaches.

value.title: Machine learning and AI used to rapidly detect sepsis, cutting risk of death dramatically
value.excerpt: A groundbreaking advance in quickly detecting sepsis using machine learning has been pioneered by researchers in the Hancock Lab and the department of microbiology and immunology at UBC.

value.title: Daily AI Acquires Whiteboard CRM
value.excerpt: Today, Daily AI, the provider of intelligent solutions for the future of mortgage lending, announced that it has acquired Whiteboard CRM. Whiteboard provides a mortgage CRM built to accelerate lead management,

value.title: Guardrail failure: Companies are losing revenue and customers due to AI bias
value.excerpt: New survey finds that 80% U.S. firms found problems despite having bias monitoring or algorithm tests already in place.

value.title: AI Startup DeepScribe Raises $30 Million To Help Prevent Physician Burnout
value.excerpt: The San Francisco-based startup uses AI to transcribe doctors' interactions with their patients, which saves them an average of three hours of work a day.

value.title: Language I/O aims to strengthen its AI-powered customer service localization service
value.excerpt: Langauge I/O, a startup developing technology to localize customer service experiences with AI, has raised $6.5 million in venture capital.

value.title: Great Resignation Versus Increasing Investment In AI, Robotics And Automation: A Troubling Trend
value.excerpt: Hiring continues to sputter, while investors are declaring the "golden age of automation." Are we automating the workforce of the future?

value.title: Has AI found a treatment for Fragile X?
value.excerpt: What if AI can substantially speed it up? That's the premise of Quris, an artificial intelligence company hoping to disrupt the pharmaceutical arena. The company just announced the final close of $28 million in seed funding to support its clinical prediction platform.

value.title: Getting Smart About Five 2022 AI And Machine Learning Predictions
value.excerpt: As new technologies exit the realm of dreams and enter the realm of possibility and reality, there’s always a reckoning with their true capabilities. In 2021, I saw teams build the foundations for some really important AI changes in 2022.

value.title: Humans are still significantly better at predicting the weather than AI
value.excerpt: Despite all the progress that has been made in the realm of technology, AI, and machine learning, weather companies have not yet handed over the keys

value.title: IIT Guwahati, TPL launch programs in cybersecurity, AI & Deep Learning
value.excerpt: The program aims to upskill & reskill candidates for fast-moving careers in cybersecurity as well as AI & Deep Learning.

value.title: Will Artificial Intelligence Be Taking Your Next Drive-Thru Order?
value.excerpt: Many people have experienced ordering fast food in a drive-thru and opening the bag later to find their French fries are missing, or their burgers are covered in ketchup they did not want. Artificial intelligence (AI) may make ordering food through a talking box easier,

value.title: Dallas wants to be the site of Ford and Argo AI’s next autonomous vehicle facility
value.excerpt: Dallas council members will vote Wednesday on whether to approve an economic development agreement with Ford in the hopes of being home to the automaker’s next autonomous vehicle facility. Ford, an investor and customer of AV technology company Argo AI,

value.title: Watch this self-driving racecar go 173 mph with no human driver inside
value.excerpt: Autonomous racecars competed head-to-head at the Indy Autonomous Challenge at CES. The competition aims to improve self-driving technology for use on and off the racetrack.

value.title: Khris Digital Marketing Offers Unique Insight on the Future of AI Copywriting in 2022 and Beyond

value.title: Adding AI to the Construction Industry, Munich’s Conxai Raises $3M
value.excerpt: Munich-based Conxai has raised 2.7 million euros ($3 million) to harness artificial intelligence (AI) for the construction sector.

value.title: LG Electronics joins IBM Quantum Network to research AI, IoT, and more
value.excerpt: The two companies plan to spend the next three years exploring applications of quantum computing to support connected cars, digital transformation, and robotics applications.

value.title: StageZero raises $1.8M to combine mobile game rewards and AI training data
value.excerpt: StageZero has raised $1.8 million in funding to give gamers rewards for participating in in-app tasks that generate AI training data.

value.title: Future developments in AI could make your credit score obsolete
value.excerpt: While AI won't replace credit scores overnight, it is clear that it has the potential to do so in the future, changing lives across the globe.

value.title: Robotic Arms Are Using Machine Learning to Reach Deeper Into Distribution
value.excerpt: Advances in technology are moving automated picking systems from the lab to labor-strapped warehouses.

value.title: Johnson & Johnson and Microsoft partner up on digital surgery
value.excerpt: Johnson & Johnson will use Microsoft Azure cloud computing services to better connect surgeons and patients in a digital surgery ecosystem.

value.title: How ReliaQuest uses Amazon SageMaker to accelerate its AI innovation by 35x
value.excerpt: Cybersecurity continues to be a top concern for enterprises. Yet the constantly evolving threat landscape that they face makes it harder than ever to be confident in their cybersecurity protections. To address this, ReliaQuest built GreyMatter, an Open XDR-as-a-Service platform that

value.title: Inside BigScience, the quest to build a powerful open language model
value.excerpt: Hugging Face's BigScience project is making progress toward developing an open, massive -- and highly capable -- natural language model.

value.title: How to build a data science and machine learning roadmap in 2022
value.excerpt: Despite the growing enthusiasm for DSML's core technologies, getting results from its strategies is elusive for enterprises.

value.title: 5 Fresh Examples Of AI
value.excerpt: What used to be seen as niche is now widespread, with innovative AI applications across all industries. 86% of companies say AI became a mainstream technology in 2021—and it shows no signs of stopping.
